definition: thick pole/bar/rod/thick line/to mark with a thick line/to sharpen (knife)/(old) coffin-bearing pole

sentences.english: Pang argues that "slash" careers are the best proof of that shift.
sentences.chinese: 逄錦華覺得“斜槓”職業就是這種轉型的最佳證明。

sentences.english: Without the preceding slash, the period alone means any character.
sentences.chinese: 如果前面沒有反斜槓，單獨一個句點代表任意字符。

sentences.english: Single quotation marks interpolate and see the backslashes as escape characters.
sentences.chinese: 單引號插入並將反斜槓看作是轉義符。

sentences.english: When entering the command, do not use the backslash.
sentences.chinese: 輸入命令時切勿使用反斜槓。

sentences.english: To refer to non-namespaced classes, you need to put a lone backslash.
sentences.chinese: 要想引用沒有名稱空間的類，需要加上一個反斜槓。

sentences.english: Note that we've changed from backslashes to slashes as a path separator.
sentences.chinese: 注意我們將路徑分隔號從反斜槓變成了斜槓。

sentences.english: Note that we've changed from backslashes to slashes as a path separator.
sentences.chinese: 注意我們將路徑分隔號從反斜槓變成了斜槓。

sentences.english: To escape the quote, we use a backward slash to precede it.
sentences.chinese: 爲了轉換該引用，我們在它之前使用了一個反斜槓。

sentences.english: Do not enter the backslash as not part of the command.
sentences.chinese: 因此不要在命令中輸入反斜槓。

sentences.english: For example, you might use dashes in the element and attribute names.
sentences.chinese: 例如，您可能會在元素和屬性名稱上使用斜槓。

sentences.english: Remember to use forward slashes for the pathname.
sentences.chinese: 請記住爲路徑名使用前向斜槓。

sentences.english: When entering the command, do not use the backslash characters.
sentences.chinese: 輸入命令時切勿使用反斜槓。

sentences.english: Here the characters between the slashes form a simple pattern.
sentences.chinese: 在此，斜槓中間的字符形成了簡單的模式。

sentences.english: Regular expression addresses are always surrounded by slashes.
sentences.chinese: 規則表達式地址總是由斜槓括起。
